title: DEEP SPACE WAIFU
notes: In user_settings.py in the proton directory in steam, uncomment and set "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11": "1". This is what fixed it for me, but you might not have to do it.

title: DEEP SPACE WAIFU
notes:
Crashes to error message: "Failed to initiate graphics....make sure you have DirectX 11...";
Error message generated by the game, no errors reported in Steam console output.

title: DEEP SPACE WAIFU
notes: Works perfectly / no errors/ no workarounds

title: DEEP SPACE WAIFU
notes: You need to put "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" in launch options for the game to even start. Crashes on exiting.

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) Haswell Mobile x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: Tried both notes to use wine3d11 aswell as normally launching and none of them worked.
title: DEEP SPACE WAIFU

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0 AMD 18.30 , 4.15.0-34-generic, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: runs well with "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" in the launch options, crashes on exit
title: DEEP SPACE WAIFU

notes: Needt to add "export PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1;  %command%", without the quotes. Yes, it needs the "export" keyword and the semi-colon separating it from the "%command". I had to set it to windowed mode, or it'd wouldn't quit in full screen. Even then, I had to kill -9 all the wine stuff.
title: DEEP SPACE WAIFU
